thread.title: Jeff Sessions Hearing Interrupted By Code Pink
thread.title_full: Jeff Sessions Hearing Interrupted By Code Pink

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Jeff Sessions Hearing Interrupted By Code Pink
text:
Jeff Sessions Hearing Interrupted By Code Pink Share Share Tweet 
Sen. Jeff Sessions' confirmation hearing hadn't even begun before it was disrupted by protestors. Two men, clad in KKK uniforms and wearing foam "#1" fingers, got up and started shouting as Sessions entered the room. The two shouted a variety of things, including Sessions' full legal name, until they were removed by security and arrested. They were associated with the protest group Code Pink. 
Watch a video of the incident here: As Sessions walked in... pic.twitter.com/4cmgzRL2q2 â€” Lisa Desjardins (@LisaDNews) January 10, 2017 
Although the two were lacking the signature hot pink outfits associated with Code Pink, the group took credit for the stunt on Twitter. Our own @tighebarry & Lenny Bianchi arrested impersonating KKK in support of Sessions #EndRacism #StopSessions https://t.co/6miA9v0GZb 
UPDATE: Another Code Pink protestor removed. . @codepink protester being removed from the Sen. Jeff Sessions confirmation hearing pic.twitter.com/tfltHzHjPM
